title: Blind Date Teddy Bear
description: Trevor isn't like those guys you see on the covers of romance novels. He's got some body hair. He's put on a few pounds. And he's got an ex-wife he's still thinking about.Naomi has bright blue hair and still lives with her parents. She isn't sure about becoming a grown-up, but she's attracted to Trevor, and he's all man. He's got a softer side, too. A teddy bear side.* * Her Teddy Bear is a short story or novelette of 14,514 words, or about 58 book pages. * *An erotic tale for adults 18+ only.
author: Mimi Strong
